articles.title: Dramatic Unboxing of Apple's $700 Mac Pro After-Purchase Wheels Kit - Mac Rumors
articles.description:
Last month, Apple introduced a Mac Pro Wheels Kit designed for the Mac Pro that adds wheels to the machine after purchase. The kit is priced at $699.



For anyone interested in what it's like to get their hands on the wheels kit, popular YouTuber Unbox Thera…

articles.title: WhatsApp has another crucial update for iPhone and Android users - Express
articles.description: WHATSAPP has partnered with the Poynter Institute for Media Studies' International Fact-Checking Network for another hugely important update to help its two billion chat app users' access accurate information during the ongoing public health crisis.
